import React, { Component } from 'react' import {FaStar} from 'react-icons/fa' import '../ratings.css' export class Ratings extends Component { state = { loading: true, ratings: [] }; async componentDidMount(){ const url = "http://substyleprod.com/projects/APIS/ratings.json"; const response = await fetch(url); const data = await response.json(); console.log(data.length) this.setState({ratings: data, loading: false}) } render() { if (this.state.loading) { return
...loading reviews...please wait....
} if(!this.state.ratings.length) { return
No one's commenting! Be the first!
} return (

Ratings

<> {this.state.ratings.map(rating => (
{rating.header}

{rating.comment}

{rating.name} - {rating.date}

))}
) } } export default Ratings
